name: MediaXPost
body:
### What is MediaXPost?
MediaXPost is a cross-posting browser application that allows simple management of deploying creative contents to multiple media and gallery sites simultaneously. 

### Authors and Contributors
Lead Development and Architecture - @chronosis
User Experience and Design - @nanoman689

### Support
Please submit an issue through the [GitHub Issue Tracker](https://github.com/mediaxpost/mediaxpost/issues) for this project
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
